4005.superDescription:
Raises ATK & DEF by 33% for 1 turn, 
causes colossal damage to enemy 
and seals Super Attack

SpecialBonus.Description: Super Attack power will be increased even more!

4006.superDescription:
Raises DEF by 33% for 3 turns, 
causes mega-colossal damage to enemy 
and lowers ATK & DEF

SpecialBonus.Description: Super Attack power will be increased even more!
